metadata.title: CVE-2008-5150 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: sample.sh in maildirsync 1.1 allows local users to append data to arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack on a /tmp/maildirsync-*.#####.log temporaryfile.

criterions.comment: maildirsync: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
